events.title: Ukraine says 'understanding' reached on US peace plan, as Trump envoy to meet Putin
events.summary: Kyiv and Washington have moved closer to agreeing the shape of a deal to end the fighting, with Putin to be consulted next week.
events.impact_summary: Kyiv and Washington have moved closer to agreeing the shape of a deal to end the fighting, with Putin to be consulted next week.

events.title: Italian parliament unanimously votes to make femicide a crime
events.summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.
events.impact_summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.

events.title: Russian mercenaries accused of cold-blooded killings in Mali - BBC speaks to eyewitnesses
events.summary: Refugees have given the BBC a harrowing account of atrocities committed by the Russian paramilitary force.
events.impact_summary: Refugees have given the BBC a harrowing account of atrocities committed by the Russian paramilitary force.

events.title: Twenty-four Nigerian schoolgirls released over a week after abduction
events.summary: Hundreds of children remain missing following other recent abductions in Nigeria.
events.impact_summary: Hundreds of children remain missing following other recent abductions in Nigeria.

events.title: New Zealand woman gets life sentence for 'suitcase murders' of her children
events.summary: Hakyung Lee killed her two kids and hid their bodies in suitcases months after her husband died of cancer.
events.impact_summary: Hakyung Lee killed her two kids and hid their bodies in suitcases months after her husband died of cancer.

events.title: 'Once in 300 years' rain hits Thai city as floods ravage South East Asia
events.summary: The deadly floods have affected 2 million people, the majority of whom are still cut off from help.
events.impact_summary: The deadly floods have affected 2 million people, the majority of whom are still cut off from help.

events.title: Palestinian-US teen held by Israel for nine months without charge due in court
events.summary: Mohammed Ibrahim, 16, from Florida, was detained by Israeli soldiers while on holiday in the occupied West Bank.
events.impact_summary: Mohammed Ibrahim, 16, from Florida, was detained by Israeli soldiers while on holiday in the occupied West Bank.

events.title: Teens launch High Court challenge to Australia's social media ban
events.summary: They argue the law - which will block users under 16 from having social media accounts - is unconstitutional.
events.impact_summary: They argue the law - which will block users under 16 from having social media accounts - is unconstitutional.

events.title: Robert Irwin wins Dancing with the Stars, a decade after sister's victory
events.summary: Son of the late conservationist Steve Irwin, Robert was a fan favourite this season.
events.impact_summary: Son of the late conservationist Steve Irwin, Robert was a fan favourite this season.

events.title: Bolsonaro ordered to start serving 27-year prison sentence for Brazil coup plot
events.summary: The Supreme Court says the former leader has exhausted his appeals and will start his prison term at a police station in Brasilia.
events.impact_summary: The Supreme Court says the former leader has exhausted his appeals and will start his prison term at a police station in Brasilia.

events.title: Fame lowers life expectancy for musicians, study finds
events.summary: Being a famous singer can lower your life as much as occasionally smoking cigarettes.
events.impact_summary: Being a famous singer can lower your life as much as occasionally smoking cigarettes.

events.title: Israel receives coffin that Hamas says contains Gaza hostage's body
events.summary: The remains will be transferred to Israeli forces, who will take them to Israel's forensic medicine institute for identification.
events.impact_summary: The remains will be transferred to Israeli forces, who will take them to Israel's forensic medicine institute for identification.

events.title: Ex-wife of Dubai royal says she fears arrest as custody battle escalates
events.summary: Zeynab Javadli's ex-husband has lodged a criminal complaint with Dubai police, accusing her of kidnapping their three daughters.
events.impact_summary: Zeynab Javadli's ex-husband has lodged a criminal complaint with Dubai police, accusing her of kidnapping their three daughters.

events.title: Foreign tourists to pay extra fee to visit US national parks
events.summary: Non-residents will soon have to pay a higher price to enter 11 of the United States' most popular parks.
events.impact_summary: Non-residents will soon have to pay a higher price to enter 11 of the United States' most popular parks.

events.title: Who is Trump's 'drone guy' Dan Driscoll, taking key role in Ukraine talks?
events.summary: The youngest-ever US army secretary has been thrust into the spotlight as the face of renewed efforts to end the years-long war.
events.impact_summary: The youngest-ever US army secretary has been thrust into the spotlight as the face of renewed efforts to end the years-long war.
